## AvroAdapterInterceptorOptions.(constructor)

Creates instance of HttpErrorInterceptorOptions

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(disabled?: boolean, fingerprintHeaderName?: string, typeHeaderName?: string, customAcceptContentTypeHeader?: string);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  disabled | boolean | Indication whether this interceptor is disabled |
|  fingerprintHeaderName | string | Name of header used for passing fingerprint of schema |
|  typeHeaderName | string | Name of header used for passing name of type |
|  customAcceptContentTypeHeader | string | Value passed to custom Accept header and Content-Type header |
